{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3487351,"name":"","username":"noamrose","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/noamrose/{size}/264006_2.png","created_at":"2025-01-19T06:51:59.470Z","cooked":"

Hi,
My team is currently planning on having a rotational arm on top of an elevator.
I wanted to ask what forces do you take in account in your mechanism characterization besides the kS, kV, kA, kG: robot’s acceleration, elevator’s acceleration, etc.
We are using 2 Kraken X60 for the elevator and 1 Kraken X60 for the arm.
Thanks.
